TopicTitle: More orange coats and uses for them.

Articles.Content:
When kerbal training is implemented we should make orange suited kermans captains. We start put with only the three legends and we can suplement them with aditional kermen with equally well suited names.

Names like John, Mitch, Roger and Mike. All the strange generated names work well for grunts, but captains need good ones.

Why have captains? Other than RP there could be other bonuses like more science when transmiting (clear and consise reports) and maybe a few actions only they can do like a "follow me" command for eva kerbals.

Personally i just want the RP.
